page.title: 04Swimbridge Newland 1985
page.content: The Parish of Swimbridge covers half of the neighbouring village of { {Landkey} and this part is known as{ {Swimbridge Newlands.}Like Swimbridge itself Newlands staddles the A.361. There has been a large proportion of new housing during the last twenty years or so. There are no shops or other amenities - the nearest facilities being in Landkey proper. Primary school children recieve their formal education in Swimbridge or Landkey. Most people in this community work in Barnstaple, only 3 miles distant although a few retain their links with the land.
